professional_photography.description: Prompts que geram imagens com qualidade fotográfica profissional
templates: Professional photography of {subject}, shot with Canon EOS R5, 85mm lens, golden hour lighting, shallow depth of field, cinematic composition, ultra-detailed, 8K resolution
Award-winning photograph of {subject}, perfect lighting, rule of thirds composition, professional color grading, sharp focus, bokeh background
High-end commercial photography featuring {subject}, studio lighting, pristine composition, luxury aesthetic, ultra-sharp details

iconic_locations.description: Prompts que incluem landmarks icônicos como nas primeiras imagens
templates: Stunning view of {landmark} during {time_of_day}, professional photography, perfect composition, vibrant colors, architectural beauty
Iconic {landmark} photographed from unique angle, golden hour lighting, cinematic perspective, travel photography masterpiece
Breathtaking landscape featuring {landmark}, natural lighting, panoramic view, professional travel photography

unique_compositions.description: Composições únicas como chás na praia
templates: Artistic composition of {objects} placed on {location}, sunset lighting, professional product photography, cinematic mood
Creative still life featuring {objects} in unexpected {environment}, golden hour, artistic photography, perfect composition
Minimalist arrangement of {objects} against {backdrop}, professional lighting, artistic vision, ultra-detailed
object_combinations: elegant tea cups on pristine beach

animal_portraits.description: Retratos de animais com qualidade profissional
templates: Professional pet portrait of {animal}, studio lighting, shallow depth of field, expressive eyes, ultra-detailed fur texture, award-winning photography
Majestic {animal} portrait, natural lighting, perfect focus on eyes, professional wildlife photography, emotional connection
Artistic portrait of {animal}, dramatic lighting, professional composition, gallery-quality photography

style_variations.minimalist_premium: Ultra-minimalist composition, premium aesthetic, clean lines, sophisticated color palette, luxury brand photography style
style_variations.dynamic_professional: Dynamic composition with movement, professional sports photography style, action captured perfectly, high-speed photography
style_variations.artistic_cinematic: Cinematic composition, movie poster aesthetic, dramatic lighting, artistic vision, gallery-worthy photography
